words.source: H5493 conj. + Qal perf. 3cp of סוּר 'to turn aside, depart'; KJV 'shall depart', ESV 'shall go away', NASB 'will depart'
H6854 art. + n.fp tsephardeyaʿ 'frog'; KJV 'the frogs', ESV 'the frogs', NASB 'the frogs'
H4480 prep. min 'from' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'from thee', ESV 'from you', NASB 'from you'
H1004 conj. + prep. min + n.mp construct bayit 'house' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'from thy houses', ESV 'from your houses', NASB 'from your houses'
H5650 conj. + prep. min + n.mp construct ʿeved 'servant' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'from thy servants', ESV 'from your servants', NASB 'from your servants'
H5971 conj. + prep. min + n.ms construct ʿam 'people' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'from thy people', ESV 'from your people', NASB 'from your people'
H7535 adv. raq 'only, surely'; KJV 'only', ESV 'only', NASB 'only'
H2975 prep. b- + art. + n.ms yeʾor 'Nile'; KJV 'in the river', ESV 'in the Nile', NASB 'in the Nile'
H7604 Niphal impf. 3fp of שָׁאַר 'to remain, be left over'; KJV 'shall they remain', ESV 'be left', NASB 'they will be left'
